title: Organize Discovery Documents
description: A firm has received a large production of documents from the opposing party. A paralegal needs to organize them.

tasks.description: Load the received documents into the e-discovery platform.
Perform OCR (Optical Character Recognition) on all documents to make them text-searchable.
tasks.expected_outcome: All image-based documents are now searchable.

tasks.description: Organize the documents by custodian (the person they came from) and date to prepare for review.
tasks.expected_outcome: The documents are logically organized for the review team.
